_header: Hold thy thumb in thy fist
_description: A proverbial couplet, translating Sit pollex pugno si sciuissem fugiendo

BodDou52.Transcription:
Holde þy thombe in thi fystAnd kepe þe welle fro had I
                    wyst
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 53.

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
Holde thy thombe in þy fysteAnd kepe þe well fro hady
                    wyste
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 103.
